snippet: In his new solo show, “Charlie,” at the Abrons Arts Center, the experimental choreographer Alex Escalante delves into fears about the environment.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premiere of choreographer Alex Escalante's solo show Charlie at the Abrons Arts Center.
lead_paragraph: In his new solo show, “Charlie,” at the Abrons Arts Center, the experimental choreographer Alex Escalante delves into fears about the environment.

headline.seo: Alex Escalante’s ‘Charlie’ at Abrons Arts Center
headline.main: An Apocalyptic Road Trip, With Three Worriers and One Optimist
headline.print_headline: An Apocalyptic Road Trip, With Three Worriers and One Optimist
